CHAT.comment: Teaching. Mother and Child sit on floor. First Mother teaches Child to string beads. Then , Mother teaches Child to sort black and white buttons. Child is fairly intelligible.

u.a: returns to beads; reaches for a bead .
returns to Mother; picks up bead .
has been trying to do it throughout Mother's instruction .
Child put white button in box .
puts black button in box for white .
takes black button out and points to box .
intonation changes , pushes box to Child , moves buttons .
dumps out box with black and white button together .
looks up and sees Child pointing to shirt .
drops button but it misses the box .
